nodes.text: The Endor Gate was a black hole located near Endor, in the Moddell sector of the Outer Rim Territories. At some point during the reign of the Galactic Empire, the University of Bar'leth chartered a scientific expedition to study the Endor Gate. However, within hours of the expedition's first observations, its members were attacked by the Imperial Navy, hinting that the Empire was hiding something in the Endor system.
